name: Sushmita Sen
subject: Complaint about purchased Television from Samsung
message: The product worked well for only 3 weeks after purchase date. There were intense sparks and after that television stopped working.

name: Hrithik Roshan
subject: Complaint about purchased MS office subscription
message: MS office is not accepting the correct product key. Please resolve it asap.

name: Shah Rukh Khan
subject: Complaint about recent visit to Mariotte hotel
message: Inspite of pre-booking couple days before, the staff asked for the payment details citing that their online record do not shows our registration.

name: Parineeti Chopra
subject: Complaint about purchased Air conditioner from Sony
message: The product stopped working after the technician replaced the coolant.

name: Salman Khan
subject: Periodic servicing of Water Purifier
message: It has been 2 months since the RO purifier servicing is due but there is no support provided from Vendor.
